title: Equivalent conditions for regularity (extended abstract)

references.title: Communication complexity and quasi randomness,
references.raw: F.R.K. Chung and P. Tetali, Communication complexity and quasi randomness, SIAM J. Discrete Math. 6 (1993), no. 1, 110{123.

references.title: Equivalent conditions for regularity, in preparation,
references.raw: Y. Kohayakawa, V. R odl, and J. Skokan, Equivalent conditions for regularity, in preparation, 1999.

references.title: graphs, strongly regular graphs and pseudorandom graphs,
references.raw: , Random graphs, strongly regular graphs and pseudorandom graphs, Surveys in Combinatorics 1987 (C. Whitehead, ed.), London Mathematical Society Lecture

references.title: Multiparty protocols, pseudorandom generators for logspace, and time-space trade-os,
references.raw: L. Babai, N. Nisan, and M. Szegedy, Multiparty protocols, pseudorandom generators for logspace, and time-space trade-os, J. Comput. System Sci. 45 (1992), no. 2, 204{232, Twenty-rst Symposium on the Theory of Computing (Seattle, WA, 1989).

references.title: Pseudo-random hypergraphs,
references.raw: J. Haviland and A.G. Thomason, Pseudo-random hypergraphs, Discrete Math. 75 (1989), no. 1{3, 255{278, Graph theory and combinatorics (Cambridge, 1988).

references.title: Pseudorandom graphs, Random graphs '85 (Pozna n,
references.raw: A.G. Thomason, Pseudorandom graphs, Random graphs '85 (Pozna n, 1985), North-Holland Math. Stud., vol. 144, North-Holland, Amsterdam-New York, 1987, pp. 307{331.

references.title: Quasi-random classes of hypergraphs,
references.raw: F.R.K. Chung, Quasi-random classes of hypergraphs, Random Structures and Algorithms 1 (1990), no. 4, 363{382.

references.title: Quasi-random set systems,
references.raw: , Quasi-random set systems, Journal of the American Mathematical Society 4 (1991), no. 1, 151{196.

references.title: Regular partitions of graphs,
references.raw: E. Szemer edi, Regular partitions of graphs, Probl emes Combinatoires et Th eorie des Graphes (Colloq. Internat. CNRS, Univ. Orsay, Orsay, 1976) (Paris), Colloques Internationaux CNRS n. 260, 1978, pp. 399{401.

references.title: testing the \pseudo-randomness" of a hypergraph,
references.raw: , On testing the \pseudo-randomness" of a hypergraph, Discrete Math. 103 (1992), no. 3, 321{327.

references.title: The size-Ramsey number of graphs of bounded degree, in preparation,
references.raw: Y. Kohayakawa, V. R odl, and E. Szemer edi, The size-Ramsey number of graphs of bounded degree, in preparation, 1999.

references.title: The uniformity lemma for hypergraphs,
references.raw: P. Frankl and V. R odl, The uniformity lemma for hypergraphs, Graphs and Combinatorics 8 (1992), no. 4, 309{312.

references.title: Uniformity of set systems,
references.raw: V. R odl and J. Skokan, Uniformity of set systems, in preparation, 1999.
